```{r import}
cbst <- fread("inputs/all_CBST_migrated_90.csv") %>% mutate(Spp = toupper(Sp_code)) #%>% filter(HTp_pred >0.97)
spp <- c("FDI", "FDC", "LW", "PY", "PW", "CW")
overrun <- fread("./inputs/2023_Overun_List.csv") %>% filter(Spp %in% spp) %>% mutate(BGC = str_replace_all(SourceBGC," ", ""))
xx <- cbst %>% filter(Spp == "PW")
```


```{r join tables, echo=FALSE}
cbst2 <- left_join(overrun, cbst, by = c("Spp" = "Spp", "BGC" = "BECvar_seed")) %>% filter(Season == "Sp")
PW <- cbst2 %>% filter(Spp == "PW")
bgcs_interest <- c("SBS")
overruns_SBS <- cbst2 %>% filter(str_detect(BECvarfut_plantation,  "SBS"))
fwrite(overruns_SBS, "./outputs/2023_overruns_SBS.csv")
ICH_bgcs_interest <- c("ICHmc2", "ICHmc1", "ICHwc", "ICHvc", "ICHmm", "ICHvk2", "ICHwk3", "ICHwk4")
overruns_ICH <- cbst2 %>% filter(BECvarfut_plantation %in% ICH_bgcs_interest)
fwrite(overruns_ICH, "./outputs/2023_overruns_ICH.csv")
ESSF_bgcs_interest <- c("ESSFmc", "ESSFwv", "ESSFwk1", "ESSFmv3")
overruns_ESSF <- cbst2 %>% filter(BECvarfut_plantation %in% ESSF_bgcs_interest)
fwrite(overruns_ESSF, "./outputs/2023_overruns_ESSF.csv")
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
